card.name: Toshi Ranbo
card.property: This province starts the game faceup and cannot be turned facedown. It cannot be a stronghold province. Characters played from this province enter play with 1 additional fate on them.

card.name: Scene of the Crime
card.property: Reaction: After this province is revealed – look at your opponent's hand.

card.name: Gateway to Meido
card.property: Cannot be a stronghold province. During conflicts at this province, you may play characters from your dynasty discard pile into the conflict as if they were in your hand.

card.name: Hiruma Signaller
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is defending, sacrifice this character and choose a character you control - ready that character and move it to the conflict.

card.name: Fifth Tower Watch
card.property: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When you sacrifice a character, choose an opponent. That opponent must choose a character he or she controls with lower [Military] skill than the sacrificed character - bow that character.

card.name: Sententious Poet
card.property: Reaction: After your opponent spends fate to play a card during a conflict in which this character is participating - gain 1 fate.

card.name: Esteemed Tea House
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which you control a participating Courtier, choose an attachment on a participating character - return that attachment to its owner's hand. That player cannot play copies of that card until the end of the phase.

card.name: Magistrate of Reason
card.property: As an additional cost for your opponent to trigger a character ability during a conflict in which this character is attacking, that opponent must spend 1 fate to an unclaimed ring.

card.name: Akodo Zentarō
card.property: Disguised Bushi. Action: During a conflict in which this character is attacking, choose a non-unique holding in the attacked province - gain control of that holding and move it to one of your unbroken provinces, if able, discarding each other card in the province. Otherwise, discard it.

card.name: Shiba Sophist
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating - search the top 5 cards of you conflict deck for a card that shares a Trait with an element of the contested ring, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle.

card.name: Shameless Gossip
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, choose two characters controlled by the same player - move a status token from one of those characters to the other.

card.name: Shinjo Kyōra
card.property: Disguised Cavalry. Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating - switch the contested ring with a ring in the unclaimed ring pool. (The attacking player gains all fate on that ring. Retain the ring's conflict type.)

card.name: Hantei Sotorii
card.property: Pride. Action: During a [Military] conflict in which this character is participating, choose a participating character - that character gets +3 glory until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Give No Ground
card.property: Action: During a [Military] conflict, choose a defending character you control - until the end of the conflict, that character gets +2[Military] and cannot have its skills reduced. (This includes by attachments, lasting effects, and status tokens.)

card.name: Moment of Perfect Beauty
card.property: Action: During a conflict, if you control more honored participating characters than your opponent - after your opponent's next action opportunity, resolve the conflict as if both players passed consecutively.

card.name: Greater Understanding
card.property: Attach to a ring. Reaction: After fate is placed on attached ring - resolve that ring's effect as if you were the attacking player.

card.name: Blade of 10,000 Battles
card.property: Attach to a unique character you control. Limited. Restricted. Reaction: After attached character wins a conflict, if you are more honorable than your opponent, choose a card in your conflict discard pile - add that card to your hand.

card.name: Command Respect
card.property: Action: During a conflict, if you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent - as an additional cost for your opponent to play an event during this conflict, that opponent must give you 1 honor. (Max 1 per conflict.)

card.name: Purity of Spirit
card.property: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating Bushi character - honor that character. At the end of the conflict, discard any status tokens on it.

card.name: False Loyalties
card.property: Reaction: After an opponent wins a conflict, if he or she is more honorable than you, choose a participating character that opponent controls and a character in that opponent's home - switch those characters' locations.

card.name: Adorned Barcha
card.property: Attach to a unique character you control. Limited. Restricted. Action: During a [Military] conflict in which attached character is not participating, choose a participating character - bow that character and move attached character to the conflict.

card.name: A Perfect Cut
card.property: Action: During a [Military] conflict, choose a participating Bushi character - that character gets +2[Military] until the end of the conflict. If it wins the conflict, honor it.
